meanings.sent1: The mussy room had clothes scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent2: Her hair looked mussy after playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The mussy painting resembled a colorful chaos.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a mussy jungle of wildflowers.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen was so mussy that finding anything was a challenge.

meanings.definition: To make something messy or untidy.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally mussy the neatly folded laundry.
meanings.sent2: Please don't mussy up the living room before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent3: He tried to mussy up his sister's room as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The wind mussy the carefully arranged sand sculptures on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The kids always manage to mussy the play area within minutes of cleaning it.
